request.description:
Attempt to Sign Up (creates a new user)

Body content example:

{
    "email": "israelTest8@ages.pucrs.br",
    "name": "Master",
    "password": "simulados@ages",
    "username": "Israel",
    "about": "About me"
}

Return example:

{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Successfully created new user",
    "user": {
        "status": "active",
        "id": 18,
        "email": "israelTest8@ages.pucrs.br",
        "password": "$2a$08$N8S3MbBOoofD8ycaDLoVqORh1/3QxS/U8szEpOsWjqIxm9WHwTNPi",
        "name": "Master",
        "username": "Israel",
        "about": "About me",
        "updatedAt": "2018-10-27T20:36:32.887Z",
        "createdAt": "2018-10-27T20:36:32.887Z"
    },
    "token": "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoxOCwiaWF0IjoxNTQwNjcyNTkyLCJleHAiOjE1NDA3NzI1OTJ9.W_cfABGB9dxvzXUTo_kp3XTkyUvKUpb6Gtm_KVnRhqE"
}

Attempt to Sign In with given user

Body content example:

{
    "email": "admin@simulados.com",
    "password": "admin"
}

Return Example:

{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Successfully login",
    "token": "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoxLCJpYXQiOjE1NDA2NzI2MjIsImV4cCI6MTU0MDc3MjYyMn0.LeZtoOJQtUKEg5OIOWOKm2CeV-Zr6A57PMjS-sTiFtA",
    "data": {
        "user": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Admin",
            "username": "admin",
            "about": "about me",
            "email": "admin@simulados.com",
            "password": "$2a$08$FZNXJAmVUPTPLBWdnMuequ.dppzWtlocW9wyA3zMTBTpka2eQehnq",
            "last_login": null,

            "updated_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z",
            "user_id": 1
        },
        "coordinator": {
            "id": 1,
            "area_id": 1,
            "email": "admin@simulados.com",
            "name": "professor",
            "password": "$2a$08$FZNXJAmVUPTPLBWdnMuequ.dppzWtlocW9wyA3zMTBTpka2eQehnq",
            "active": true,
            "created_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z",
            "updated_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z",
            "user_id": 1
        },
        "professor": {
            "id": 1,

            "user_id": 1

}

Return all the registred users


Return Example:


{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Users found",
    "users": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Admin",
            "username": "admin",
            "about": "about me",

}

Return a specific user by its id information

example of return:

{
    "success": true,
    "message": "User found",
    "user": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Admin",
        "username": "admin",
        "about": "about me",
        "email": "admin@simulados.com",
        "password": "$2a$08$FZNXJAmVUPTPLBWdnMuequ.dppzWtlocW9wyA3zMTBTpka2eQehnq",
        "last_login": null,
        "status": "active",
        "createdAt": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z"
    }
}

updates an user by its id

Example of body:

{
    "email": "testUser@simulados.com",
    "password": "admin",
    "name": "Israel",
    "username": "TestIsrael",
    "about": "about me"
}

example of return:

{
    "success": true,
    "message": "User updated",
    "user": {
        "id": 19,
        "name": "Israel",
        "username": "TestIsrael",
        "about": "about me",
        "email": "testUser@simulados.com",
        "password": "$2a$08$vq4H4u7w6Tv5y5rYFT1wGOIAbIKmgSSrpnTIGfFStHnM0RSH5ihgG",
        "last_login": null,
        "status": "active",
        "createdAt": "2018-10-27T20:39:08.000Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-10-27T20:41:53.000Z"
    }
}

Responsible for creating an exam and participation

Example of Body:

{
	"student_id": 1
}


Example of return:

{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Successfully created new exam",
    "participation": {
        "created_at": "2018-10-27T20:43:03.703Z",
        "updated_at": "2018-10-27T20:43:03.703Z",
        "id": 22,
        "participation_date": "2018-10-27T20:43:03.703Z",
        "time_of_conclusion": null,
        "student_id": 1,
        "practise_exam_id": 23,
        "numberOfQuestions": 25,
        "numberOfCorrectAnswers": 0,
        "numberOfWrongAnswers": 0,
        "hitRatio": 0
    },
    "exam": {
        "created_at": "2018-10-27T20:43:03.635Z",
        "updated_at": "2018-10-27T20:43:03.635Z",
        "id": 23,
        "aob_exam": true,
        "aob_exam_year": 2018
    }
}

Responsible for generating a list of questions with pagination by a given amount

Example no shown due to huge amount of information

Responsible for creating and updating an answer on database

Example of body:

{
    "question_id": "4",
    "participation_id": "3",
    "alternative_id": "20",
    "time_to_answer": 0
}

Example of return:

{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Resposta atualizada com sucesso!",
    "selectedAlternative": {
        "id": 20,
        "question_id": 5,
        "professor_id": 1,
        "description": "será extinto, apenas se a sanção aplicada for de suspensão ou se for reincidente em infração disciplinar.",
        "correct": false,
        "created_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z",
        "updated_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z"
    },
    "correctAlternative": {
        "id": 16,
        "question_id": 4,
        "professor_id": 1,
        "description": "A recusa de Antônio à indicação de outro profissional pelo cliente não constitui infração ética, pois o advogado não é obrigado a aceitar a indicação de outro profissional para com ele trabalhar no processo. Por sua vez, o substabelecimento do mandato a Lucas independe de comunicação a João, já que constitui ato pessoal do advogado da causa.",
        "correct": true,
        "created_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z",
        "updated_at": "2018-10-12T21:48:14.000Z"
    },
    "answer": {
        "id": 15,
        "question_id": 4,
        "participation_id": 3,
        "alternative_id": 20,
        "created_at": "2018-10-23T23:25:54.000Z",
        "updated_at": "2018-10-27T20:44:29.000Z",
        "time_to_answer": 0
    }
}

Responsible for generating a list of questions with pagination by a given amount

Example no shown due to huge amount of information
It receives the student_id and an exam_id to create a participation on database and return it

body.raw:
{
	"professor_id": 1, 
	"coordinator_id": 1, 
	"subarea_id": 1, 
	"statement": "mMichael foi réu em um processo criminal, denunciado pela prática do delito de corrupção passiva. Sua defesa técnica no feito foi realizada pela advogada Maria, que, para tanto, teve acesso a comprovantes de rendimentos e extratos da conta bancária de Michael. Tempos após o término do processo penal, a ex-mulher de Michael ajuizou demanda, postulando, em face dele, a prestação de alimentos. Ciente de que Maria conhecia os rendimentos de Michael, a autora arrolou a advogada como testemunha. Considerando o caso narrado e o disposto no Código de Ética e Disciplina da OAB, assinale a afirmativa correta.", 
	"approved": 1, 
	"comment": "Lorem ipsum",
	"studyMaterials": "Lorem ipsum"
}
